CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, June 19, 1954, pg. 21 reads: "6. The Calvert Distillers Corporation who gave a 10-day honeymoon trip to the bride and groom to the Lord Calvert Hotel in Miami, Fla., had a beautiful booth to display their products. Pictured here are Robert Walker, Calvert supervisor for Western Pennsylvania; Harry Waugh of Philadelphia, Pa., sales representative Eastern Pennsylvania, and Albert Hayes, Carstairs supervisor, Western Pennsylvania."
TitMainTitle: Three men, including one wearing hat, standing in Calvert Whiskey booth in Hunt Armory for the 1954 Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair
